resources.string: Please log in to use the application.

Welcome to the RESI App. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. We value your privacy and are committed to keeping the information you provide to us confidential.
Keputih No. 3, Sukolilo, Surabaya, East Java.
Reset your password by entering your email.
a. Personal Information: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and phone number when you register or use our app.
b. Usage Information: We may collect information about how you use our app, including transaction history and your interactions with app features.
c. Device Information: We may collect device information such as device type, operating system, and other log information.
a. We use the information we collect to provide services, manage your account, and process your transactions.
b. We may use the information to send notifications, updates, or other relevant information.
c. We will not share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except as required by law.
We maintain the security of your information by taking appropriate steps to protect your personal information from unauthorized access or disclosure.
We may use cookies or similar technologies to collect information about your usage. You can adjust your cookie preferences through your browser settings.
This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time. The latest version of the policy will always be available in our app.
a. You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information that we hold.
b. If you have any questions or privacy-related requests, please contact us at ofcresi@gmail.com.
By using the RESI App, you agree to this Privacy Policy and the processing of your information in accordance with the terms outlined in this policy.

Please carefully read these Terms of Service before using the RESI developed application. By accessing or using this Application, you agree to be bound by the terms outlined below. If you do not agree with these terms, do not use this Application.
The RESI Application is a platform that allows users to store, manage, and view digital receipts, as well as access various other services provided by the Developer.
a. You agree to use this Application only for legitimate purposes and in compliance with applicable laws.
b. You are responsible for all activities that occur in your account and must maintain the confidentiality of your password.
c. You may not use this Application for purposes that infringe on the copyrights, trademarks, or other rights of third parties.
a. We respect your privacy, and we will collect, use, and disclose your data in accordance with our Privacy Policy. You agree to the use of your data as outlined in that Privacy Policy.
b. You are responsible for the security of your own data, and you must take appropriate measures to protect your personal information.
a. The Developer is not responsible for any losses or damages that may arise from the use of this Application.
b. This Application is provided as is without any warranties, whether express or implied.
5. Changes to the Terms of Service.

The Developer reserves the right to change, modify, or update these terms of service in accordance with the applicable policy. Such changes will be effective immediately upon being posted in the Application.

These terms of service are governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of Indonesia. You agree that the courts in Indonesia shall have exclusive jurisdiction over any disputes arising from or related to the use of this Application.
If you have any questions or comments about these Terms of Service, you can contact us at ofcresi@gmail.com.
